title: font search
content:
Hello everybody, who can help me out. The font on the image I included are not so easy as the look. The one with the names has a very specific E and R combination for a slab serif font. The one with the figures has a very specific 4, iâ€™m looking for them now for a while, who can help me out?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207180126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/place-figu_5629.jpg)
author: highres@euronet.nl

comments.content:
[Farao](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207180126/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/index.php?id=59) has some of that slab flavour.
